titles.title: Max Cleland Congressional Gold Medal Act of 2016
A bill to award a Congressional Gold Medal to former United States Senator Max Cleland.
Max Cleland Congressional Gold Medal Act of 2016

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Max Cleland Congressional Gold Medal Act of 2016
This bill directs the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President pro tempore of the Senate to arrange for the award of a Congressional Gold Medal to Joseph Maxwell "Max" Cleland.
